title: "The Rick Perry Endorsement of Ted Cruz" in Middle of Nowhere, Center of Everything
description: <div class="medium-feed-item"><p class="medium-feed-image"><a href="https://medium.com/middle-of-nowhere-center-of-everything/the-rick-perry-endorsement-of-ted-cruz-e536d447e8a9?source=rss-7b10f6cef3c2------2"><img src="https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/fit/c/600/200/1*akld9yYLygMJCPKs3NDrPQ.jpeg" width="600" height="200"></a></p><p class="medium-feed-snippet">Rick Perry is one of my favorite political leaders to come out of Texas. He&#8217;s done a lot for our state and I think he could have done so&#8230;</p><p class="medium-feed-link"><a href="https://medium.com/middle-of-nowhere-center-of-everything/the-rick-perry-endorsement-of-ted-cruz-e536d447e8a9?source=rss-7b10f6cef3c2------2">Continue reading on Medium »</a></p></div>

title: Rubio: Rock Solid Interviews
description: <div class="medium-feed-item"><p class="medium-feed-image"><a href="https://medium.com/@texansforrubio/rubio-rock-solid-interviews-dd5b990c53fc?source=rss-7b10f6cef3c2------2"><img src="https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/fit/c/600/200/1*9XKg_fSBdPR3FZztpsjdBg.jpeg" width="600" height="200"></a></p><p class="medium-feed-snippet">As the last debate, before voting starts, draws near Rubio has been hitting the airwaves getting his message out to more and more people&#8230;</p><p class="medium-feed-link"><a href="https://medium.com/@texansforrubio/rubio-rock-solid-interviews-dd5b990c53fc?source=rss-7b10f6cef3c2------2">Continue reading on Medium »</a></p></div>

title: Rubio and the American Dream
description: <div class="medium-feed-item"><p class="medium-feed-image"><a href="https://medium.com/@texansforrubio/rubio-and-the-american-dream-99b83c31d224?source=rss-7b10f6cef3c2------2"><img src="https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/fit/c/600/200/1*CLtI_3XpBADHzyXsOBOScQ.png" width="600" height="200"></a></p><p class="medium-feed-snippet">&#8220;If we take the lead and do what must be done, we&#8217;ll expand the American Dream to touch more people and change more lives than ever.&#8221; &#8230;</p><p class="medium-feed-link"><a href="https://medium.com/@texansforrubio/rubio-and-the-american-dream-99b83c31d224?source=rss-7b10f6cef3c2------2">Continue reading on Medium »</a></p></div>
